subject: Collection of tax from franchisee for leasing of toll plazas as per provision of Section 206-C(IC) of Income Tax Act
text: TTMTHT 9fudruT Phone 91-11-25074100/250742( #Tra4 7751q Fax 91-11-25093507/250935  (Ta 4ta6t, 731 5tar3 *r TAT TrTT Extn_ 2223/2318/2468/25: National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Shipping. Road Transport & Highways) 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-1{0075 Ref: No. NHAIF&ATDS 18.03.2005 CRRCULAR Income-Tax Act 1961 Section 206-C has been amended by insertion of Sub- Section (1C) made effective from Ist October; 2004 on collection of tax at sources on the payments made to NHAI by the franchisee for leasing of toll plaza. The provision attracts collection of tax at source from franchisee(other than PSU) together with the said payment at the fied rates_ Project Directors are advised to comply with the provision of Section 206-C (IC) of Income Tax Act and collect the amount at the fied rates plus surcharge and education cess on the receipt from Ist October, 2004 onwards. If the tax has not been collected; the same may be collected with interest and deposited to Govt: Alc on or before 31" March, 2005. Amended provisions of the Act are enclosed for guidance and the same may be strictly complied in future as well This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
